sample.description: Wild-type mouse pancreatic islets treated with high glucose.
sample.protocol: High-pressure freezing and freeze-substitution with 2% OsO₄, 1% UA, 0.5% GA, 5% H₂O in acetone with 1% methanol, followed by 0.2% TCH in 80% methanol at RT, 2% OsO₄ in acetone at RT, 1% UA in acetone + 10% methanol.
sample.contributions: Sample provided by Andreas Mueller and Michele Solimena (Paul Langerhans Institute, Dresden), prepared for imaging by Song Pang (HHMI/Janelia), with imaging and post-processing by C. Shan Xu (HHMI/Janelia).
